title: Four Fish - thesis of the passage

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes how the thesis of the passage is conveyed?

choices.label: It is stated explicitly at the beginning of the passage.
It begins as a simple statement but is quickly qualified.
It is expressed as a conclusion and supported by specific evidence.
It evolves and becomes more explicit as the passage develops.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
